  • Method Details

    • loadFile

      public static void loadFile() throws Exception
      Loads the text file into an ArrayList.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error loading the file

    • SaveFile

      public static void SaveFile() throws Exception
      Saves the ArrayList to the text file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error saving the file

    • booleanNamecheck

      public static boolean booleanNamecheck()
      Checks if the entered name is in the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      true if the name is found in the ArrayList, false otherwise

    • nameCheck

      public static Player nameCheck(String x)
      Returns the player object associated with the given name.
      Parameters:
      x - the name of the player to search for
      Returns:
      the Player object associated with the name, or null if not found

    • topPlayer

      public static ArrayList<Player> topPlayer()
      Finds the top 2 players in the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the top 2 players

    • applyGame

      public void applyGame() throws Exception
      Applies the game to the player.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the game

    • applyGame2

      public void applyGame2() throws Exception
      Applies the game to the player.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the game

    • display

      public void display() throws Exception
      Displays the game menu and handles user input.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while displaying the menu or handling user input
